== Athirampuzha (CT) (628172) ==

Athirampuzha (CT) is a town in the [[Kottayam]] taluka of [[Kottayam]] district with an area of 20.33 sq. km. and harbouring 9805 households with total population of 40438 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Kottayam]] is at a distance of 12 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 160 km. Male population is 20122 and female population is 20316. Scheduled Caste population is 1687 and Scheduled Tribes population is 177. Census Location Code of the town is 628172<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class III (population_total 20,000 to 49,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Alappuzha (m + og) at a distance of 48 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kochi (m corp. + og)  at a distance of 66 km. Railway station is at Ettumanoor at a distance of 4 km.
